1 About Functional Developer CORBA

1.3 Features of Functional Developer CORBA

The following features are supported in the Functional Developer version 2.0 Enterprise Edition:

  • CORBA 2.0 with parts of CORBA 2.2 (notably the POA)
  • Internet Inter-ORB Protocol (IIOP) 1.0 (GIOP 1.0)
  • Portable Object Adapter (POA)
  • Dynamic Invocation Interface (DII)
  • Dynamic Skeleton Interface (DSI)
  • Dylan Language Binding
Developing Component Software with CORBA - 26 May 1999
